articleinfo.title: GNOME Nettool Manual V2.7

abstract.para: Nettool Manual GNOME's Nettool gives a graphical user interface for a number of network tools, such as ping, netstat, traceroute, port scan, lookup, finger, and whois.

articleinfo.releaseinfo: This manual describes version 2.17.1 of GNOME Nettool.

legalnotice.title: Feedback
legalnotice.para: To report a bug or make a suggestion regarding the GNOME Nettool application or this manual, follow the directions in the GNOME Feedback Page.

sect1.title: Introduction
sect1.para: This is only a template to get the documentation done. It should not be translated.
